name: Paper Dungeons
description: Paper Dungeons is a fantasy board-game boosted by online content. With the ability to create and share online your own levels, you're up for an infinite replay value! The game is visualized as a classic tabletop board-game with dice and tokens, and has 4 game modes: Boardgame, Campaign, Puzzle and Rogue.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Single Core 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb non integrated DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible

reviews.review_text: What ended up as playing this game to kill time, turned into playing several hours at a time. It is good.  The only thing I believe is lacking in this game are the mechanics behind the dice system they use. In particular, which dice set is best for which monsters. If they wrote a nice FAQ for that, that would be awesome.
There really is no reason to play this when 'desktop dungeons' exists. It doesn't outcompete that game in any respect, so I'm never going to play this again.
